posts.postText:
1) Evan Michael McMahon

2) [NNJG] Weeze

3) STEAM_0:0:22358213 

4) REDACTED@REDACTED

5) I have been visiting the Flood server about every day for close to a month now.

6) I am mainly interested in moderation, however I do enjoy photoshopping and writing, idk if there is anything I can do with those two things but who knows.

7) I absolutely love the flood server NNJG offers, throughout the past month I have become friendly with several of the admins in NNJG and enjoy all of them. In short, the server and people on the server kick ass. 

8 ) I have been playing GMOD for over a year and a half now so I know a lot about building etc.

9) I have never owned a GMOD server though I did look into it at one time.

10) I have donated in the past and will continue to donate as long as I am playing GMOD. I will not abuse my powers as admin, but I will not be afraid to use them against people who try to break rules.
